TopicTitle: Why can't place these propellant tanks above the others?

Articles.Content:
Hello, I've been trying to create a large rocket like I've seen in videos or pictures, but I'm not able to place the propellant tanks above the others, any idea why? I can place one but not the others, they're red.

Edited July 7, 2013 by InF3RNo
It looks like you might have struts coming off the top of the bottom tanks, try moving them, it counts as a part..
Try placing it somewhere else first and then place it there.

It looks like you might have struts coming off the top of the bottom tanks, try moving them, it counts as a part..

Oh right, the struts it was, I can't believe I didn't see it before.

Thanks,

InF3RNo.
